content:
After discussing how to add "from" and "into" objects to a `CollisionTraverser`, the document explains how to visualize active collisions in your scene using Python or C++ code, which helps you see where collisions are occurring.

The CollisionTraverser can visually show the collisions that are occurring by using the following line of code:

python

trav.showCollisions(render)

cpp

trav->show_collisions(window->get_render());
